detail_desc: Short-sleeved top in patterned jersey with smocking on the shoulders and flounced sleeves. Narrow elastication at the sides for best fit.

Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a pleated weave made partly from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Elasticated drawstring seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and extra-wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a narrow, adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The bra is made partly from recycled polyester.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Ribbed, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist. Wide waist panel containing a concealed key pocket.
Sleeveless V-neck top in soft jersey with twisted shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the front.
Metal hair grips in the shape of skeleton hands. The zinc content of the hair grips is recycled.
Blouse in embroidered lace with frills and a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back. Long, balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy, floral-print viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover with buttons at the front.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shoulder seams with a frill trim, and long sleeves with a frill-trimmed seam above the elbows, and elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a seam at the hips. Short jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a deep V-neck at the back with ties at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Shirt designed to fit a small dog in a patterned cotton weave with a sheen. Collar, openings for the front legs and a hole for the lead at the back of the neck. Opening underneath with a smart hook and loop fastening that does not attach to fur.
Push-up bras in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with double shoulder straps that cross at the back and a sewn-in inner top with an elasticated hem (no inner top in sizes 2-8Y).
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative satin ties at the sides and a half-string back.

Cargo trousers in stretch twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a zip fly and button, side pockets, fake flap back pockets and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Slim legs with decorative stitching at the knees.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with stone-like plastic beads, sparkly glass stones and metal beads. Diameter 5 cm.

All-in-one suit knitted in thermal fleece with contrasting colour trims, a jersey-lined hood, and two zips down the front with chin guards. Foldover ends at the cuffs and hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Fleece inside.
Suede ballet pumps with a large bow over the foot. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a glittery print motif on the front, lined hood, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hem, side support and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton. Hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, adjustable tabs with press-studs at the sides and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Joggers in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a soft finish. Regular drawstring waist with covered elastication, side pockets and tapered legs.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Short skirt in soft, patterned jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, covered elastication at the waist, short legs and a lined front.
Wide hairband in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective details. Width 9 cm.
Small elasticated scrunchies in various designs.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets.

Outdoor jacket with lightly padded front and back sections in functional fabric, a lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long, ribbed raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and side sections. Partly lined.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Knee-length parka in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and press-studs at the cuffs. Drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a single back vent and a drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Jersey T-shirt.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a gentle V-neck at the back with concealed press-studs. Seam at the waist and a flared tulle skirt. Fully lined in woven fabric with tulle at the hem.
Bracelets in various designs. Four elastic bracelets with beads in mango wood and plastic. One braided bracelet made from waxed cord.
Lined, underwired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jacket in soft, fluffy faux fur with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.
Short, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a scalloped trim around the neckline and hem. Lined.
Short top in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Small imitation leather shoulder bag with fringing and small printed text on the front, a braided shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 15x19 cm.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with comfortable stretch. Elastication at the back of the waist, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed collar and zip down the front. Flap patch pockets with a press-stud at the front, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and kangaroo pockets. Jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Shorts in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets, and fake back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam at the waist and peplum.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed cuffs and hems.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined wrapover hood, high wrapover slits at the sides and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Can be used both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Partly lined, patterned bikini. Top with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder, and a narrow strap over the other shoulder. Lined at the front. Matching, fully lined bikini bottoms.

Ankle-length chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Soft cap in UV-protective fabric with a peak at the front and flap at the back to protect both the face and back of the neck. UPF 50.
Bikini top with a frill trim that continues up over the shoulders, a wrapover front with long straps that tie at the back and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with a fringed strap across the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and chunky soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel approx. 5 cm.
Leggings in denim with appliqués on the knees, an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cap in cotton twill with elastication at the back.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, double-layered flutter sleeves and a gathered yoke.
Trainers fully-fashioned in one piece with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and chunky, fluted soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Ankle-length trousers woven in a soft viscose blend with wide elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, fake back pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with creases.
5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
